name: wasm-pvm-tests
description: Comprehensive AssemblyScript test suite for WASM-PVM

scripts.build: asc assembly/*.ts --target release --runtime stub --noAssert --optimizeLevel 3 --shrinkLevel 2 --converge --use abort= --binaryFile build/test.wasm --textFile build/test.wat
scripts.build:all: for f in assembly/*.ts; do name=$(basename $f .ts); asc $f -o build/$name.wasm -t build/$name.wat --runtime stub --noAssert --optimizeLevel 3 --shrinkLevel 2 --converge --use abort=; done
